VICTORIA RETREAT

Ayubowan to victoria Retreat 

Step into the distinguished world of victoria Retreat , a boutique hotel in Kandy where colonial elegance lingers in the highland air. This restored tea estate bungalow in the Hanthana region offers modern travellers a retreat infused with charm and timeless ease. Guests can enjoy the comforts complete with personal touches and serene private spaces. Surrounded by hills and forests, the estate provides scenic views and landscapes that captivate at every glance, making it one of the most scenic places to be. Each room and veranda is thoughtfully appointed, reflecting luxury in the hills, where heritage details meet contemporary indulgence.

Allow the hills to set the rhythm of your stay, and discover a residence where every corner tells a story of gracious living. Plan your escape and experience heritage, hospitality and highland splendour in one unforgettable stay.

VICTORIA RETREAT

A Bawa Masterpiece in the Heart of the Cultural Triangle

Designed by renowned architect Geoffrey Bawa, Heritance Kandalama is set in 211 acres of protected forest, in Sri Lanka's cultural triangle, UNESCO Sigiriya as your backdrop. Completed in 1994, this iconic hotel blends modernist design principles with a deep reverence for local heritage and environmental sustainability. From immersive cultural experiences to destination weddings and authentic Sri Lankan dining Heritance Kandalama is your gateway to a world of tranquility and new discoveries.

ACCOMMODATION

Tropical Tranquility and Contemporary Elegance

Experience Bawa's tropical modernist design with breathtaking lake views and lush jungle canopies just minutes from iconic cultural landmarks like the Dambulla Cave Temples and Sigiriya Rock Fortress. Relaxing serene rooms and suites which blend nature, exclusivity and contemporary comforts.
